channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (20 Nov 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-11-20/#comment-244">Susanta</a>.
Thanks Susanta, Tara did a great job!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susanta.

Thanks Susanta, Tara did a great job!

item.title: By: Evelyn
item.dc:creator: Evelyn
item.description: What else can I say? Nice Work!
item.content:encoded: What else can I say? Nice Work!

item.title: By: John Lauber
item.dc:creator: John Lauber
item.description: Nice work, Tara. Lots of great things happening with Genesis this week.
item.content:encoded: Nice work, Tara. Lots of great things happening with Genesis this week.

item.title: By: Carly
item.dc:creator: Carly
item.description: Oh man, now there's ANOTHER theme I want to buy - Simply Pro. Absolutely lovely.
item.content:encoded: Oh man, now there’s ANOTHER theme I want to buy – Simply Pro. Absolutely lovely.

item.title: By: Susanta
item.dc:creator: Susanta
item.description: Really like the round-up for this week! Thanks for the efforts - it really useful and I can't really thank you enough! I've always been a fan of Themedy and didn't' have any clue they were coming up with a new theme - looks gorgeous!
item.content:encoded: Really like the round-up for this week! Thanks for the efforts – it really useful and I can’t really thank you enough! I’ve always been a fan of Themedy and didn’t’ have any clue they were coming up with a new theme – looks gorgeous!

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description:
Thank you for the mention! I had a great time visiting with Lindsey, and we had fun shopping for gifts for the giveaway winner.
Great guest editorial!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for the mention! I had a great time visiting with Lindsey, and we had fun shopping for gifts for the giveaway winner.

Great guest editorial!
